H.R. 654 - Drug-Free Communities Pandemic Relief Act - lobbied in support of the DFC Pandemic Relief Act, which would, on a case-by-case basis, temporarily waive the program's required local matching

S. 2792 - National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2022 - lobbied for the exclusion of a marijuana-related provision, the SAFE Banking Act, from the National Defense Authorization Act.
